titles.title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 12/15/1987--Introduced. Elects the following Members to the specified committee of the House of Representatives: (1) H. Martin Lancaster, to the Committee on Agriculture; and (2) Paul E. Kanjorski and George J. Hochbrueckner to the Committee on Science, Space and Technology.
